admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
trustfund:
TF020930-NEW ZEALAND CONSULTANTS TRUST FUND,TF036750-VIETNAM - IRRIGATION
            REHABILITATION PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The environmental impact assessment
            (EIA) for the Hoc Mon - North Binh Chan Project provides an
            assessment of the possible negative project impacts the
            human (resettlement excepted) and physical environment of
            the study area, discusses off-site aspects likely to
            adversely affect the planned development and recommends
            measures to eliminate or mitigate any undesirable effect.
            Issues covered by the study are: 1) conversion of acid
            sulphate soils; 2) drainage and disposal of acid sulphate
            soils; 3) liquid effluent disposal; 4) off-site
            environmental factors; 5) pesticide use; 6) fertilizers use;
            7) water-borne diseases; 8) management of aquatic
            ecosystems; 9) other issues related to construction; 10)
            public consultation; and 11) management of Saigon River watershed.
